titleStmt.title: The vials of the wrath of God poured forth upon the seat of the man of sin, and upon all professors of the world, who denieth the light of Christ which he hath enlightned every one withal, and walk contrary to it, with it they are condemned : and a vvarning from the Lord to all who are walking headlong to destruction in the lusts of the flesh, and deceits of the world, that they may repent and turn to the Lord, lest the overflowing scourge sweep them all into the pit / by him who is called George Fox.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained and slightly faded, with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
